title: UCI Gravel World Championships Elite Women’s Start List + Riders to Watch
content:
Pauline Ferrand Prevot, Lorena Wiebes, Demi Vollering, Sofia Gomez Villafañe, and Tiffany Cromwell are just a few standout names in a deep field of 110 elite women's riders.

Read the full article at UCI Gravel World Championships Elite Women’s Start List + Riders to Watch on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
